description.raw:
* Requires [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/280/document-actor-make-skin-and-animation/diff) SDF pull request

* This PR should make [this](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/366/actor/diff) tutorial work

Changes:

* Use same skin and animation in `cafe.world`

* Made the shirt of `moonwalk.dae` red, so it is different from the other actors. This helps explaining the difference between skin and animation in the tutorial.

* Refactored `physics::Actor` so:

    * Scripts can be used without skin / animation (so it works if we have only links)

    * If animation is not specified, try to get animation from skin

* Added tests for actors

Changes:

  • Made the shirt of moonwalk.dae red, so it is different from the other actors. This helps explaining the difference between skin and animation in the tutorial.

  • Refactored physics::Actor so:

    • Scripts can be used without skin / animation (so it works if we have only links)

    • If animation is not specified, try to get animation from skin

  • Added tests for actors
